# thunder_fw_urpf (Resource)

`thunder_fw_urpf`: Unicast Reverse Path Forwarding (Default: loose)

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_fw_urpf" "test_thunder_fw_urpf" {
  status = "strict"
}
```
